name: Yamaha R15
description: One of the best sports bike in BD.It is japanese origin and sporty looking bike.Milage is very good compare to others.

name: Royal Enfield
description: Boss look with stylish Royal enfield.Demand is very high in Market.Targeted mostly young students.

name: Royal Enfield Himalayan
description: Best for long tour and special for non-smooth road.This comes with 410cc power , which makes it special.

name: KTM
description: Speed king with sporty look.It has advance breaking system and handaling is very comfortable.

name: Yamaha RS
description: New comer in the market and hype is very high as it comes with very attractive looking and gives high milage.

name: Yamaha FZS v2
description: One of the best bike in its price range and it is ruling the market.Soon it going to market out.Though, demand is very high.

name: Yamaha FZS v3
description: Sport Bike for Racing .Also good fon highway ride. Its accelaration is quite good an built quality is in another level.

name: Suzuki v1
description: This is a bike for gentelman who use their bike for office purpose.It gives good milage and suitable for 3 member family.

name: Royal Enfield 600cc
description: Best bike ever in the history of bangladesh.Higher cc bike and it is called king of the high road .Comfortable with 2 pillion.

name: Honda Hornet
description: Modified version of honda xblade.This is one of the best bike of honda in bangladesh.it comes with powerfull engine(200cc.)

name: Bajaj Pulsar Ns160
description: Accelaration of of this bike is super cool.Young Bikers most favourite bike and look is also very good.

name: Honda CBR
description: This is Thai version of honda cbr. Mostly popular for its look and design.Made in Thailand.
